summary: A simple change to make Detect life find those pesky undead\'s, demons and mechanical things.
descriptionHtml:
A simple change to make Detect life find those pesky undead\'s, demons and mechanical things.

To that end the following magical effects have been edited:
DetectLifeEnemyExteriorConcSelf
DetectLifeEnemyInteriorConcSelf
DetectLifeFriendInteriorConcSelf
DetectLifeFrientExteriorConcSelf
DetectLifeEnemyInteriorSelfFF
DetectLifeEnemyExteriorSelfFF
DetectLifeFriendInteriorSelfFF
DetectLifeFriendExteriorSelfFF

The spell itself isn\'t changed so it should be compatable with most mod\'s that implement/modify detect life spells without changing the effects. 

The Aura Whisper shout isn\'t modified in any way.

Changelog:
1.2 Compatibilty changes with Dwemer Goggles (it used DetectLifeFriendInteriorSelfFF)
1.1: Cleaned the addon and uploaded to steamworks.

Same file as on steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=89351182
author: Woffie
